scripts.build: pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend build && pnpm --filter ./apps/frontend build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter ./apps/backend prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && concurrently "pnpm --filter ./apps/backend dev" "pnpm --filter ./apps/frontend dev"
scripts.dev:full: pnpm sync-schemas && pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && concurrently "pnpm --filter ./apps/backend dev" "pnpm --filter ./apps/worker dev" "pnpm --filter ./apps/frontend dev"
scripts.worker:dev: pnpm sync-schemas && pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/worker prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/worker dev
scripts.build-backend: pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/backend build
scripts.build-worker: pnpm sync-schemas && pnpm --filter @zerocancer/shared build && pnpm --filter ./apps/worker prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/worker build
scripts.start:production: cd apps/backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm start
